task.summary: Default task
Initial commit with skeleton Api Controller and initial model
Minor change
Added dependency on ILogger
Tested usage of Logger to log an Info log
Configured dependency on Swashbuckle and tested the API documentation page coming up
Implemented skeleton service interface and impl, not used currently
Implemented skeleton repository interface and impl in a persistence project, not used currently
Implement addition of a report; though issue is that a duplicate entry is silently ignored; also set env for SECRET_KEY, and used bearer token when testing through postman, added postman collection
Implemented GetAllReports, DeleteReport;Added dependency on ConfigurationFactory which is required TenantTime dependency GetReport updated to return non-deleted records,
Implemented facilty of including deleted reports in GetAllReports

Forcibly reading the token in the service, so that for any request 401 is returned if Bearer token is not present. Also the findings are as follows 1. If Mongo Collection is used with predicate that uses TenantService to find tenant id, and bearer token is not present then 500 error is returned 2. If TokenReader.read is invoked during processing of a request, then 401 is returned. Adding code in controller did not help, but in service class, it is working properly
Updated code to use Query instead of Collection to fetch list of reports
Added TenantTime dependency in repository; setting CreatedOn when creating reports
Updated index to allow same template code, if all earlier deleted; now AddReports returns 400 in case of duplicates in the input list
Updated GetReport to return 400 in case of invalid id format, and 404 in case when a report could not be found
Updated code to return a deleted report when using query parameter to specify the option
Updated Xml Documentation in the controller & applied relevant annotations (Json return type, return codes, etc.) on endpoints
Minor update to XMl documentation
Outlined the algorithm for the generation of a report
Added DatasourceUrl property to a report
Changed the unique index from template-code+deleted-date to only name, this is because multiple reports can exist for the same template code having different datasource urls. Also updated XML doc
(Incomplete functionality) XML Doc update; moved algo comment to service, implemented first two steps of getting a report, and validating the datasource url
Added GET for report generation to postman collection
Implemented a test controller that returns sample data to test report generation
(Still incomplete) Created a singleton ReportingService with the value defined in an environment variable; report is generated with jsreport server
Updated test method to return sample data from value received in the query params

Added docker-compose to run dockerized jsreport which is paired with a MongoDB running on localhost; since using localhost was creating a problem, LAN IP was used. There is also mapping to local file system volume which can be used to house custom configuration
Completed basic (without all validations, many noted in TODOs) end-to-end flow for giving report input, and subsequent report generation which is downloadable
Updated postman collection with up-to-date calls for generating reports
Added more properties to Report, reorganized template properties in an object
Using name from report object instead of hard coding report name
Using report information to create file name, also service signature changed to return multiple info units in a single object

Implemented support for searching with either id or code using a single endpoint. This will work since id is Object Id and code is supposed to be a short code for human consumption. The code for search needed if-else because in the same predicate and invalid ObjectID raises Format exception and the code does not check next predicate for Code equality
MInor XmlDoc and code-convention related variable name change

Implemented schema based validation; handled exception cases like jsreport server not available, report not found, etc; suitably updated the postman collection; Also now instead of name, short id of a jsreport can be used
Removing few exception classes, as their case is covered by existing JsReportExcpetion
Minor change in Idea IDE files

MESSAGE.value: Added TenantTime dependency in repository; setting CreatedOn when creating reports
Updated index to allow same template code, if all earlier deleted; now AddReports returns 400 in case of duplicates in the input list
Updated GetReport to return 400 in case of invalid id format, and 404 in case when a report could not be found
Updated code to return a deleted report when using query parameter to specify the option
Updated Xml Documentation in the controller & applied relevant annotations (Json return type, return codes, etc.) on endpoints
Minor update to XMl documentation
Outlined the algorithm for the generation of a report
Added DatasourceUrl property to a report
Changed the unique index from template-code+deleted-date to only name, this is because multiple reports can exist for the same template code having different datasource urls. Also updated XML doc
(Incomplete functionality) XML Doc update; moved algo comment to service, implemented first two steps of getting a report, and validating the datasource url
Added GET for report generation to postman collection
Implemented a test controller that returns sample data to test report generation
(Still incomplete) Created a singleton ReportingService with the value defined in an environment variable; report is generated with jsreport server
Updated test method to return sample data from value received in the query params

Added docker-compose to run dockerized jsreport which is paired with a MongoDB running on localhost; since using localhost was creating a problem, LAN IP was used. There is also mapping to local file system volume which can be used to house custom configuration
Completed basic (without all validations, many noted in TODOs) end-to-end flow for giving report input, and subsequent report generation which is downloadable
Updated postman collection with up-to-date calls for generating reports
Added more properties to Report, reorganized template properties in an object
Using name from report object instead of hard coding report name
Using report information to create file name, also service signature changed to return multiple info units in a single object

Implemented support for searching with either id or code using a single endpoint. This will work since id is Object Id and code is supposed to be a short code for human consumption. The code for search needed if-else because in the same predicate and invalid ObjectID raises Format exception and the code does not check next predicate for Code equality
MInor XmlDoc and code-convention related variable name change

Implemented schema based validation; handled exception cases like jsreport server not available, report not found, etc; suitably updated the postman collection; Also now instead of name, short id of a jsreport can be used
Removing few exception classes, as their case is covered by existing JsReportExcpetion
Minor change in Idea IDE files

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Minor change in Idea IDE files
